name: RoboJep (itch)
description:
RoboJep is a Platforming/Physics Based Puzzle Game. Fly through obstacles, solve small puzzles and avoid dangerous obstacles!

Progress through 15 levels and at the end, you will be fighting the Narrator!

【Features】

【Take advantage of the Physics Flight System!】

【Traverse dangerous obstacles! Some of them are moving :) 】

【Carry objects to their destination to unlock locations!】

【Your gonna be dying a lot :)】

【And finally meet the Narrator!】

This game was our first ever project, It's not perfect. But were glad we finally finished it.

Only Available on Windows

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Processor: Dual core 2.00GHz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 520
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
